summary: This document is an email forwarding a voice message attachment related to the Epstein case, sent on August 7, 2019, from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO-NYS) concerning Epstein victims. The email includes a timestamp and an audio file attachment.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded Regarding Epstein Victims
events.description: An email was sent forwarding a voice message attachment concerning Epstein victims from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 7, 2019, concerning Epstein victims.
It originates from or is related to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO-NYS).
The email contains an attached audio file (0190807 132930.wav) described as a voice message.
The subject line indicates the communication is specifically about 'EpsteinVictims'.
